casebody.data:
TROY WHITE GRANITE CO. v. LEHTOLA. (Circuit Court of Appeals, First Circuit. January 15, 1903.) No. 458. Charles C. Milton (Chandler Bullock, on the brief), for plaintiff in error. William A. Pew, Jr., for defendant in error.

Before COLT and PUTNAM, Circuit Judges, and ALDRICH, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

The decree of the circuit court is affirmed, with costs for the defendant in error.
